src:
A alcaldesa da Coruña visita a Real Academia Galega

04 Nov 2019, 21:10


A comisión executiva da Real Academia Galega recibiu hoxe a alcaldesa da Coruña nunha visita institucional que concluíu cun encontro no que ambas as partes ratificaron a vontade compartida de profundar na colaboración entre o Concello da Coruña e a Academia. A reunión deu continuidade á primeira xuntanza mantida entre Inés Rey e o presidente da RAG, Víctor F. Freixanes,  o pasado mes de setembro no pazo de María Pita.



Pola esquerda, Víctor F. Freixanes, Marilar Aleixandre, Inés Rey, Fina Casalderrey, Henrique Monteagudo e Jesús Celemín. Fonte: RAG

Víctor F. Freixanes agradeceu a presenza na Academia da rexedora do Concello da Coruña, a institución municipal que acolleu  durante décadas a Academia no pazo de María Pita, antes do seu traslado á rúa Tabernas 11, recordou. Ás portas da súa sede dende 1978, Inés Rey foi recibida polo propio presidente e o secretario da RAG, Henrique Monteagudo; a tesoureira, Marilar Aleixandre; e a arquiveira-bibliotecaria, Fina Casalderrey.
A rexedora, acompañada polo concelleiro de Cultura, Jesús Celemín, deixou constancia no libro de honra da institución da vontade do Concello da Coruña de seguir a colaborar "na defensa da nosa lingua e da nosa cultura", unha intención que concretou tamén na reunión mantida tras coñecer a biblioteca, o arquivo e demais instalacións da Academia. Inés Rey detívose tamén na Casa-Museo Emilia Pardo Bazán, situada na primeira planta do edificio que pertenceu á escritora coruñesa.
text:
The Mayor of A Coruña visits the Royal Galician Academy

04 Nov 2019, 21:10


The executive commission of the Royal Galician Academy today received the Mayor of A Coruña on an institutional visit which concluded with a meeting in which both parties ratified the shared will to deepen the collaboration between the City Council of A Coruña and the Academy. The meeting continued the first meeting between Inés Rey and RAG President Víctor F. Freixanes last September in María Pita's palace.



On the left, Victor F. Freixanes, Marilar Aleixandre, Inés Rey, Fina Casalderrey, Henrique Monteagudo and Jesús Celemín. Source: RAG

Víctor F. Freixanes thanked the presence in the Academy of the governess of the City council of A Coruña, the municipal institution that hosted for decades the Academy in the pazo de María Pita, before his transfer to the street Tabernas 11, he recalled. At the door of his headquarters since 1978, Inés Rey has been welcomed by RAG's own president and secretary, Henrique Monteagudo; the treasurer, Marilar Aleixandre; and the archivist-librarian, Fina Casalderrey.
The councilor, accompanied by the Councilor for Culture, Jesús Celemín, recorded in the honor book of the institution of the will of the City Council of A Coruña to continue to collaborate "in the defense of our language and our culture", an intention that also concretized in the meeting held after learning about the library, archive and other facilities of the Academy. Inés Rey also stopped at the Emilia Pardo Bazán House-Museum, located on the first floor of the building that belonged to the writer from A Coruña.
